entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY LATE THIS EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
WEST WINDS AROUND 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY SUNNY
COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 40S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS AROUND 50
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN AFTER MIDNIGHT
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH RAIN LIKELY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 50S
